name: Building Planner for Clash of Clans Free
name_original: Building Planner for Clash of Clans Free
description:
Are you looking for a tool to help you get ahead in Clash of Clans? A tool that will help you get organized and help you choose what to build and research next? If so, Building Planner is the app for you!

Enter what you have build so far and you will quickly see a summary of what needs to be built and in what order you should prioritize.
